name: Fight Ascension
storyline: Survive the onslaught of endless waves of humanoid monsters in melee combat with manual mechanics. Defend, dodge, and counterattack as a warrior named Sentinel Ignis, who can manipulate fire to face his adversaries.
summary: Survive the onslaught of endless waves of humanoid monsters in melee combat with manual mechanics. Defend, dodge, and counterattack as a warrior named Sentinel Ignis, who can manipulate fire to face his adversaries.
